title: Infinite Terrain
description: This project showcases procedural infinite terrain generation. Basically minecraft, but using roblox's terrain system.

title: Movement System
description: A simple physics based movement system.

title: PETS GO - Skill Tree
description: I can replicate anything. This project showcases a skill tree system from the game PETS GO. Better, more efficent and easier to use.

title: A complex AI module
description: Creating AI isn't easy. This project showcases a complex AI module that can be used in any game. Whether it's fighting, pathfinding, or even just wandering around.

title: Simple Obby
description: A fun little obby I made! Sometimes simple things can make the best projects.
